report.title: Getting High Like Towlie
report.author: The Mayor
report.bodytext: age:24 /n wt:280 /n dosage:see story /n /n Well the long wait was over. It had arrived, my jwh-018, and a long wait it was. I received a gram of off-white yellowish powder. As I understand this is the appearance that you want, as opposed to a rust colored lump that others have been buying on the internet. /n /n A friend and I decided to try it out. I could not find a proper vaporization (meth) /n pipe so first I improvised with a light bulb based vapor pipe. I took a tiny amount /n of the powder and put it in the bulb. I just stuck the tip of a knife in and got as /n little as I could. i took 1-2 hits and blew out very little smoke as did my friend. /n /n It took aboubt 5 minutes to start affecting us noticably. The effects were identical /n to smoking very good marijuana. I was not extremely 'high' per se but the effects /n were unmistakable. /n /n We followed up by smoking roughly the same amount on foil. this worked much better /n but it was difficult to get it to that point where all the smoke releases at the /n same time in a big cloud. We got pleasantly baked. After we were already high and /n hit the foil again we could notice a rush right when it hit us. the buzz lasted for /n about 1.5 hrs. /n /n 4 hours later I went to another friends house and were gonna get good and blasted this /n time we did a few foil boats and got extremely high. It lasted about an hour for me /n but was extremely pleasant. I'm sure i went over the 5mg dose recommendation and /n I did not have any sort of paranoia or 'bad place' type feelings. All and all it /n went very well and the only thing I am going to do differently in the future is get /n a vaporization pipe rather than that nasty foil. /n /n Its not for everyone as the method to smoke it is a difficult learning process that /n is more for the harder drug user. /n /n In closing I think that milder forms like Spice are probably better if one /n plans on smoking it for a long time (probation). But for the price per use jwh-018 /n is unbeatable. In the future I plan to use the proper pipe and I am going to try /n oral dosing dilluted in grain alcohol. /n /n Side effects: munchies, red eye, short term memory loss, telling stories no one /n wants to hear, cottonmouth, and telling stories with no point. Hope this helps. /n /n The Mayor
